review: Sir had treated my wife for Chikungunya. She was admitted at Fortis and Sir came to visit twice a day. He is very polite, gentle and well experienced and thanks to his advice, my wife has recovered very fast. Overall I m very satisfied with his service and would visit him again for any future necessities.
